meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the family Loganiaceae.
meanings.sent1: The logania is a type of plant that grows in specific areas.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful logania flower in the garden yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The logania plant decided to throw a party for all the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: The logania stood tall among the other plants, like a king in a forest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the logania made it stand out from the rest of the garden.

meanings.definition: A plant belonging to the genus Logania.
meanings.sent1: The logania in our backyard attracts many butterflies.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother takes great care of her logania plant.
meanings.sent3: The logania plant seemed to be dancing in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The logania plant's leaves reached out like welcoming hands.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the logania filled the air with sweetness.
